/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -shared -Wl,-soname,libperception_palm.so -o /home/marcus/catkin_ws_WAM/devel/lib/libperception_palm.so CMakeFiles/perception_palm.dir/include/MCP2210-Library/ppalm_driver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/perception_palm.dir/include/MCP2210-Library/hid.c.o CMakeFiles/perception_palm.dir/include/MCP2210-Library/mcp2210.cpp.o /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_signals -lboost_filesystem /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librostime.so -lboost_date_time /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -lconsole_bridge -ludev -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/indigo/lib
